name: Needmore Claymore
description:
You are Plasma Snake, famed stealth operative. On your latest mission, you were dropped in without any gear, and all you could find were several claymores.

WASD to move.
Spacebar to drop a claymore. BEWARE! You can't set them off, but they can still kill you! Plan accordingly!

There is currently no win or loss condition. Reload the page to try again. Sorry.

Made in three hours for the Bean Jam #9!! Theme: Clay.
